Report of the session of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland, Term 9, Session 57, Day 2 (2022-06-23)

bibl.title: Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP
Minutes of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland
bibl.publisher: Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

revisionDesc.change: Tomaž Erjavec: Generate TEI version of MTed corpus.
Michał Rudolf: Generated corpus in Parla-CLARIN.

div.head: 57. posiedzenie Sejmu RP 9. kadencji, dzień 2
div.note: Resumption of the meeting at 3 p.m. 9
The meeting was chaired by Marshal Elżbieta Witek and Vice-Marshals Ryszard Terlecki, Małgorzata Gosiewska, Małgorzata Kidawa-Błońska and Piotr Zgorzelski

incident.desc: High Izbo! Everyone who travels across Europe knows that prices in Poland are already European, only Poles and Poles still earn in zlotys. For example, let us use the new mortgages that we have just mentioned. In Poland, the interest rate is around 6.5%, and in countries with euro it is on average around 2%. So it's three times cheaper in euros.

If we look at inflation, it was 7.4% on average in the euro area in April, while in Poland it was 12.4%. Unfortunately, in Poland we also pay more and more for imported goods, because the gold is very weak. And this is actually a tax on the inability of the current power. Because the weaker the government and the more political the central bank president, the weaker the currency is. In Poland, this tax is increasing.
That is why I am asking you today to discuss in substance the path to the adoption of the euro under appropriate and favourable conditions for Poles.
Information about the impact of the interpellation, queries and answers to them is available in the Sejm Information System.
This concludes the 57th session of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland.
The minutes of the sitting will be submitted to the Secretariat of the Sejm.
The agenda of the 58th session of the Sejm, convened on 6 and 7 July 2022, was served to the ladies and gentlemen.

kinesic.desc: The Vice Marshal strikes three times with a marshal's cane

u.note: The meeting is adjourned at 3 p.m. 17 min 33
